scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run pull && yarn run build-lib && yarn run build-browser
scripts.build-browser: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t babelify src/polyfill.js --no-commondir --igv global -o browser/streams.js && yarn run build-browser-opt
scripts.build-browser-opt: uglifyjs browser/streams.js -c -o browser/streams.min.js && optimize-js browser/streams.min.js > browser/streams.min.opt.js
scripts.build-lib: cp spec/reference-implementation/lib/*.js src && NODE_ENV=production babel src -d lib
scripts.clean: cd src && ls | grep -v -E 'polyfill.js' | xargs rm -rf -r ../lib/*
